title: NCLT admits Axis Financeâ€™s plea against Primat Infrapower & Multiventures
description: The Mumbai bankruptcy court has admitted Essel Group affiliate Primat Infrapower & Multiventures under the corporate insolvency resolution process (CIRP) following an application filed by Axis Finance Ltd. Axis Finance, a subsidiary of Axis Bank, approached the tribunal after the company defaulted on its dues. The Mumbai bench of the National Company Law Tribunal appointed Devarajan Raman as interim resolution professional for the company.
